translation: Supreme Bliss indeed comes to this Yogi whose mind is made peaceful, whose passion is quelled, who has become Brahman, and who is free from sin.
commentary: 6.27 Prashantamanasam one of peaceful mind? Hi verily? Anam this? Yoginam Yogi? Happiness bliss? The best supreme? Upaiti comes? Shantarajasam one whose passion is ieted? Brahmabhutam one who has become Brahman?
